BedrockKnowledgeBaseArn.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^arn:aws(|-cn|-us-gov):bedrock:[a-zA-Z0-9-]*:[0-9]{12}:knowledge-base/[0-9a-zA-Z]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

AccessRoleArn.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^arn:aws:iam::[0-9]{12}:role/(?:service-role/)?[a-zA-Z0-9_+=,.@-]{1,64}$  
Update requires: No interruption

ExternalBedrockKnowledgeBaseConfig.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

AssociationType.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: KNOWLEDGE_BASE | EXTERNAL_BEDROCK_KNOWLEDGE_BASE  
Update requires: No interruption

Key.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: ^(?!aws:)[a-zA-Z+-=._:/]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

Value.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

AssistantAssociationArn.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Pattern: ^arn:[a-z-]*?:wisdom:[a-z0-9-]*?:[0-9]{12}:[a-z-]*?/[a-f0-9]{8}-[a-f0-9]{4}-[a-f0-9]{4}-[a-f0-9]{4}-[a-f0-9]{12}(?:/[a-f0-9]{8}-[a-f0-9]{4}-[a-f0-9]{4}-[a-f0-9]{4}-[a-f0-9]{12})?$  
Update requires: No interruption
Read only property: Yes

Update requires: No interruption
Read only property: Yes

Pattern: ^[a-f0-9]{8}-[a-f0-9]{4}-[a-f0-9]{4}-[a-f0-9]{4}-[a-f0-9]{12}$  
Update requires: Replacement
